title: Season's greetings!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012054449im_/http:/typophile.com/files/happyholidays_3953.gif)
  
 [Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012054449/http:/typophile.com/node/60316?page=2) still needs work but the sentiment is sincere!
author: eliason

comments.content: It took me a minute, but once I noticed the A/a I realized that it's a brilliant unicase face. Nice work!

Happy holidays!

P.S.: Craig, what about a new year's resolution to finish Ambicase Modern? ;-)  
 [http://typophile.com/node/60316](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012054449/http:/typophile.com/node/60316 "http://typophile.com/node/60316")

Thanks Riccardo for the prod - it's already on the list! :-)  
Progress slowed way down once the semester got rolling this fall, but after the holidays I expect and hope I'll be able to move it (and [Emi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012054449/http:/typophile.com/node/50618?page=2)) forward.
Hey, looking forward to seeing this one on the move again soon! ;D
